channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Infrastructure
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Infrastructure

item.title: CVE-2023-45249|2024-08-12T21:13:05.862Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20infrastructure
item.description: Remote command execution due to use of default passwords. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.0.1-61, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.1.1-71, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.2.1-69, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.3.1-53, Acronis Cyber Infrastructure (ACI) before build 5.4.4-132.
